textBox.richText: The gem of my Android apps, the workout tool, has had a huge problem. An error in Eclipse (the IDE that almost everyone uses to make apps for the Android) caused me to delete my entire source tree. Of course, unlike EVERY OTHER PROGRAM, Eclipse does not throw things in the trash. It simply deletes them hard and firmly. Yes, I have backups, but they’re a few days old, and I was in the middle of some *major* changes. Now everything’s broken, including my will to keep working on this thing. Sigh.
